query: SELECT DISTINCT  contact.id as cid, contact.display_name, contact.organization_name as org, iso_code as country,contact.birth_date, contact.contact_type, contact.gender_id,   participant.status_id, participant.fee_amount, participant.fee_currency, participant.register_date, participant.id as id from civicrm_participant as participant INNER JOIN civicrm_contact as contact on participant.contact_id = contact.id and contact.is_deleted=0 left join civicrm_address a on a.contact_id=contact.id and is_primary=1 left join civicrm_country cty on a.country_id=cty.id where participant.event_id=%1   and participant.is_test=0;
